籤詩版本二:
Hauʻoli loa ʻo Mentingji, a pōmaikaʻi ka puka o nā hana maikaʻi.
Ua holo pono na mea a pau ma ke kula mare, a ke loaa ka mai me ka laau kupanaha, e ola ana oe
詩意:
Hōʻike kēia hexagram i kahi moe puna me nā haneli pua.
Maikaʻi nā mea a pau ke hālāwai ʻoe me ke kanaka hanohano.

(He hōʻailona kēia hexagram o ka hoʻolauleʻa maikaʻi.
Holo maikaʻi nā mea a pau.
)
解曰: He hohonu ka puna a mehana ka lā. Mohala nā pua iā lākou iho. Mai kanalua. Hōʻike mai nā kānaka.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Ka lā hānau o Guo Fenyang
Ua mālama ʻo Guo Ziyi, ka pūkaua nui o ka mōʻī Tang a me ke Aliʻi o Fenyang, i kahi pāʻina lā hānau. Ua hele mai nā ʻohana a me nā hoaaloha e hoʻomaikaʻi, a ua piha ka lewa i ka hauʻoli a me ka hauʻoli.
聖意: Pomaikai ka home o ka ohana, palekana ka pono iho, pomaikai ka waiwai, pomaikai ka oihana, pomaikai ka mare, pale aku o Liujia i ka pihoihoi, hele na kanaka hele i ke kula, pomaikai na enuhe silika, pomaikai na holoholona, ​​loaa na kanaka, hookolokoloia. lanakila, holomua ka neʻe ʻana, ʻimi koke ʻia ka waiwai nalowale, ʻo Anshan ka maʻi, maikaʻi ka lua kupapaʻu,
古人: Ka lā hānau o Guo Fenyang
